Text: Please seed... or NZB?
2:32PM PST, No seeds, come on people, I have the original file ready for this fix! Pls seed!

his is for those that still cant get the game to run



1: Go to my documents then to "My Games" folder then delete "FalloutNW" folder

2: Go to the folder where you installed the game and run "FalloutNVLauncher.exe" some messages will pop out just press ok and ok till you shut it down after that run "Fallout.exe"
(at this point it seemd like it was going to work had a black screen going, but then it crashed) so

3: Go to where you installed the game open "Regsetup.txt" it should look like this 
======================================================================

REGEDIT4 

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Bethesda Softworks] 

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Bethesda Softworks\FalloutNV]

"Installed Path"="%d"
======================================================================
Now change it so it looks like this:
REGEDIT4 

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Bethesda Softworks] 

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Bethesda Softworks\FalloutNV]

"Installed Path"="%d"
======================================================================
When you done save it then run "Reg.exe" as admin 

Then run "Fallout.exe"

At this point i was able to play the game 

If you get the black screen and then you get kicked to desktop try going to my document/my games/ and delete FalloutNV folder again 
then go to where u installed the game and run "FalloutLauncher.exe" and go through the ini not found bs again then close it and run "Fallout.exe"
======================================================================
